subheadings.rawText: Software engineering graduate with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications using \textbf{TypeScript}, \textbf{React}, and \textbf{Next.js}. Skilled in translating \textbf{Figma} designs into responsive UI components with \textbf{Tailwind CSS}. Experienced collaborating with cross-functional teams and familiar with \textbf{Python REST APIs}, \textbf{PostgreSQL}, and modern development workflows including \textbf{Git} and CI/CD.

resumeItems: \textbf{Languages & Frameworks:} TypeScript, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Vue.js, Angular, Node.js, Express, .NET.
\textbf{Cloud & DevOps:} AWS (EC2, ElastiCache), Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Kubernetes, Docker, GitHub Actions.
\textbf{Tools:} Git, JIRA, Slack, Figma.
Developed a custom \textbf{Webpack }configuration to build a hybrid \textbf{JavaScript/React Chrome extension}.
Built high-performance AWS microservices with \textbf{Go}, \textbf{ElastiCache}, and \textbf{EC2} for an asynchronous learning platform.
Mentored 6 junior developers on \textbf{TypeScript} and \textbf{React} through code reviews and pair programming.
Introduced \textbf{Agile }and \textbf{Lean} best practices, improving feature delivery and system stability.
Developed 3 new frontend screens for coupon code activation using \textbf{Next.js} with \textbf{Amplitude} for real-time analytics.
Led a sprint as \textbf{SCRUM Lead}, introducing rituals that cut incomplete Jira epics by 40%.
Collaborated across 8+ teams, ensuring timely delivery of complex features.
Configured private networks on \textbf{GCP}, reducing staging costs by 20% and enhancing security.
Designed and implemented 8+ responsive frontend components with \textbf{Vue.js}, \textbf{Tailwind CSS}, and \textbf{Figma}.
Optimized frontend performance and improved state management to increase user engagement and reduce load times.
Created a \textbf{Mock API} with \textbf{Django} and \textbf{Faker} for robust end-to-end testing of complex data pipelines.
Enhanced advertising dashboard frontend with \textbf{Angular}, implementing dynamic data visualizations.
Collaborated on UI redesign to increase usability and accessibility across devices.
Optimized \textbf{Snowflake SQL} queries, reducing API response times by 30-40%.
Developed reusable, end-to-end file validation service to prevent cyber attacks.
Built a \textbf{Next.js} frontend on \textbf{Vercel} with \textbf{Firebase Auth} & \textbf{Firestore} for interactive resume assistance.
Engineered a \textbf{Node.js}/OpenAI service on \textbf{Google Cloud Run} to auto-generate personalized documents from structured user data.
Developed a \textbf{Node.js} document service using \textbf{Firebase Storage} & \textbf{Firestore} for easy CRUD of user documents.
Standardized \textbf{Docker}-based CI/CD across the monorepo, ensuring reliable builds and deployments.
subheadings.techstack: Next.js, Vercel, Firebase, Google Cloud Run, OpenAI API, Python Flask, Docker, TypeScript

resumeItems: Built a real-time collaborative UML editor with \textbf{React}, \textbf{ExpressJS}, and \textbf{Yjs}, supporting 50+ users.
Implemented client-side \textbf{PlantUML} rendering via WebAssembly for instant diagram updates.
Integrated \textbf{Redis} caching and \textbf{PostgreSQL} backup for encrypted design storage.
Led product ownership adding authentication, cursor highlighting, and private/public rooms.
subheadings.techstack: React, ExpressJS, Yjs, Redis, PostgreSQL, WebAssembly

resumeItems: Minor in Project Management.
Relevant coursework: Software Reliability & Testing, Databases, Software Design, Data Structures.
